import math
a=int(raw_input())
q=True

while(q):
    b=str(a)
    x=0
    if b == b[len(b)::-1]:
        for i in range(2,int(math.sqrt(a))):
            if a%i==0:
                break
            else :
                x+=1
        if( x== (int(math.sqrt(a)))-2):
            print a
            q=False
    a+=1
